results.content: Great real world course. This was better than the one on Pluralsite. I really enjoyed the class. I would like to see an extention of this course, with a little more details to the DNN WebAPI for real world practical extensions of DNN, such as user import export, update with DNN WebAPI. GREAT Course, I would recommend to others!!!!

results.content: I realise that this course is on the cheaper side for a reason and I shouldn't expect the same level of quality as a course that is triple the price but time wasted is still time spent. I say this having previous intermediate experience with DNN, as I only took this course to get a better understanding with MVC module creation. With that said... the trainer assumes that the viewer is familiar with the DNN platform, it's dependencies and system configuration. While demonstrating the installation of the platform, the trainer left out a number of critical steps that a someone new to the CMS platform may or may not be initially aware of. For example, setting up IIS to host a local instance of the development platform and setting up an IIS app pool user profile with the appropriate permissions applied, etc. Some advice... it may be advisable if the author of this course spent some extra time reviewing a number of existing YouTube videos authored by Chris Hammond, the original creator of the DNN CMS Platform.
